thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 15 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Ciner Resources LP Announces Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.66

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Ciner Resources LP Announces Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.66
text:
Feb 15 (Reuters) - Ciner Resources LP:
* ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND YEAR ENDED 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q4 SALES ROSE 4.4 PERCENT TO $128.5 MILLION * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.66 * FOR 2018 MAINTENANCE OF BUSINESS CAPITAL EXPENDITURES ARE PLANNED TO BE IN RANGE OF $13 MILLION TO $15 MILLION​
* ‍EXPECT INTERNATIONAL PRICES TO BE FLAT TO DOWN 2% IN 2018​
* ‍EXPANSION CAPITAL EXPENDITURES ARE PLANNED TO BE IN RANGE OF $30 MILLION TO $35 MILLION IN 2018​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
